title: Echoes
lyrics:
Take me home
To where we belong
And the echoes of the night
Will all travel to the light
And there's a long way to go
To the end of the world

Through rain and through snow

We will never let you go



And when you hear my echo calling

(And when you hear my echo calling)

Through gravity we'll be falling

(Through gravity we'll be falling)

And when we're lost in time and space

(And when we're lost in time and space)

Will you still remember my face?



These are extraordinary times. And we face an extraordinary challenge

The dramatic achievements which occurred in recent weeks should have made clear to us all, the impact of this adventure on the minds of men everywhere, who are attempting to make a determination of which road they should take



Take me home

To where we belong

And the echoes of the night

Will all travel to the light

There's a long way to go

To the end of the world

Through rain and through snow

We will never let you go
